6: 10 PM.description:
Susan Johnson, representing 1844 Mass Ave Trust, exterior architectural
changes in the Battle Green District. On a motion duly made and seconded,  the alteration was approved
with allowance for 1 of 2 options: either order a customer window replacement to match existing OR
restore the original window and install a custom storm window.
